<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;not&#39; and becomes a sub:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X &#42; (~(-1 &lt;&lt; Z)) --&gt; X &#42; ((1 &lt;&lt; Z) - 1) --&gt; (X &lt;&lt; Z) - X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This increases uses of X, so it may require a freeze, but that is still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expected to be an improvement because it removes the multiply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5be13f3abb6bddf7ad9747b077da5a0e">m&#95;OneUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ae28f9cbf5b5e3fbeb69d1414285c1760">m&#95;Not</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5be13f3abb6bddf7ad9747b077da5a0e">m&#95;OneUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ac1c7b78fe67245930be18441b77de500">m&#95;Shl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a00ef056813d120034e387417e9cde341">m&#95;AllOnes</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(Z))))))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have the following pattern,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X = 1.0/sqrt(a)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check legality for transforming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// x = 1.0/sqrt(a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r1 = x &#42; x;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r2 = a/sqrt(a);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r1 = 1/a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r2 = sqrt(a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// x = r1 &#42; r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This transform works only when &#39;a&#39; is known positive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699" lineLink="#a4d3ad60400165f1708ea8572d996abc3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4d3ad60400165f1708ea8572d996abc3">isFSqrtDivToFMulLegal</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We change x = 1/sqrt(a) to x = sqrt(a) &#42; 1/a . This change isn&#39;t allowed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by recip fp as it is strictly meant to transform ops of type a/b to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a &#42; 1/b. So, this can be considered as algebraic rewrite and reassoc flag</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has been used(rather abused)in the past for algebraic rewrites.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the constraints on X, R1 and R2 combined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fdiv instruction and one of the multiplications must reside in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. If not, the optimized code may execute more ops than before and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this may hamper the performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBx != BBr1 &amp;&amp; BBx != BBr2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the constraints on instructions in R1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(R1, &#91;BBr1&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When you have multiple instructions residing in R1 and R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respectively, it&#39;s difficult to generate combinations of (R1,R2) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then check if we have the required pattern. So, for now, just be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() != BBr1 || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;hasAllowReassoc());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the constraints on instructions in R2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a>, &#91;BBr2&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respectively, it&#39;s difficult to generate combination of (R1,R2) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then check if we have the required pattern. So, for now, just be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() == BBr2 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;hasAllowReassoc());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sqrt(X) &#42; sqrt(Y) -&gt; sqrt(X &#42; Y)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nnan disallows the possibility of returning a number if both operands are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following transforms are done irrespective of the number of uses</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2) X &#42; 1.0/sqrt(X) -&gt; X/sqrt(X)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  The purpose is two-fold:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1) to form a power expression (of X).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  latency of the instruction Y is amortized by the expression of X&#42;X,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  and therefore Y is in a &quot;less critical&quot; position compared to what it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#a558144ce515858cbab3df5c7005a5a50"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#a558144ce515858cbab3df5c7005a5a50">InstCombinerImpl::simplifyDivRemOfSelectWithZeroOp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Change the div/rem to use &#39;Y&#39; instead of the select.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#ac2a56636a6f3742f5e495f67e67b6b36">replaceOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getOperand(NonNullOperand));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we know we replace the operand of the div/rem with &#39;Y&#39; with no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// problem.  However, the select, or the condition of the select may have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple uses.  Based on our knowledge that the operand must be non-zero,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagate the known value for the select into other uses of it, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagate a known value of the condition into its other users.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the select and condition only have a single use, don&#39;t bother with this,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// early exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SelectCond = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getCondition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;use&#95;empty() &amp;&amp; SelectCond-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan the current block backward, looking for other uses of SI.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Shl = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(ConstantInt::get(Ty, 1), Z);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With appropriate no-wrap constraints, remove a common factor in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dividend and divisor that is disguised as a left-shift amount.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(Op1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ac1c7b78fe67245930be18441b77de500">m&#95;Shl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(Z)))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (X &lt;&lt; Z) / (Y &lt;&lt; Z) --&gt; X / Y</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (X &lt;&lt; Z) / (Y &lt;&lt; Z) --&gt; X / Y</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (X &lt;&lt; C1) / C2 -&gt; X &#42; ((1 &lt;&lt; C1) / C2) if 1 &lt;&lt; C1 is a multiple of C2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ab5b599ce37d7c23ca6479c148c0a259d">isMultiple</a>(C1Shifted, &#42;C2, Quotient, IsSigned)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ((X &#42; C2) + C1) / C2 --&gt; X + C1/C2</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsSigned &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(Op1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(Op1C))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the dividend is sign-extended and the constant divisor is small enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to fit in the source type, shrink the division to the narrower type:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (sext X) sdiv C --&gt; sext (X sdiv C)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the general case, we need to make sure that the dividend is not the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimum signed value because dividing that by -1 is UB. But here, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know that the -1 divisor case is already handled above.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a special case of Z / (X / Y) =&gt; (Y &#42; Z) / X, with X = 1.0. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// m&#95;OneUse check is avoided because even in the case of the multiple uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for 1.0/Y, the number of instructions remain the same and a division is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Variety of transform for:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (urem/srem (shl X, Y), (shl X, Z))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NB: The shift cases are really just extensions of the mul case. We treat</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223" lineLink="#a177f4d30b9356e0bc4a5dc176e825cb2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="#a177f4d30b9356e0bc4a5dc176e825cb2">simplifyIRemMulShl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We may be able to deduce more about nsw/nuw of BO0/BO1 based on Y &gt;=</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BO0NoWrap = IsSRem ? BO0HasNSW : BO0HasNUW;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RemYZ = IsSRem ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>.srem(Z) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>.urem(Z);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (rem (mul nuw/nsw X, Y), (mul X, Z))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      if (rem Y, Z) == 0</span></CodeLine>
